tool_description: Get motivational quotes and motivational pictures.

api_list.name: Get a Specific Quote
api_list.description: This endpoint fetches a specific quote using the provided 'id'.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The unique identifier for the quote.

api_list.name: Get All Motivational Quotes
api_list.description: This endpoint fetches all the motivational quotes. Pagination can be done using the 'skip' and 'limit' parameters.

optional_parameters.name: skip
optional_parameters.description: The number of quotes to skip for pagination.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of quotes to return.

api_list.name: Get a Specific Picture
api_list.description: This endpoint fetches a specific motivational picture according to the given id.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The unique identifier for the motivational picture.

api_list.name: Get All Motivational Pictures
api_list.description: This endpoint fetches all the motivational pictures. Pagination can be done using 'skip' and 'limit' parameters.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of pictures to return.

optional_parameters.name: skip
optional_parameters.description: The number of pictures to skip for pagination.
